Introduction

SoHyun is a South Korean singer, dancer, rapper, songwriter and producer under MODHAUS.

From 2020 to 2022, SoHyun began uploading songs on Soundcloud. She debuted as a soloist on December 14, 2021, with the digital single "20". She was known by multiple aliases, like Han Gaeul, hene, and Autumn Han.

On April 14, 2023, SoHyun was introduced as the fourteenth member of the girl group tripleS under MODHAUS. She first debuted with the sub-unit LOVElution on August 17, 2023 with the mini album "ↀ (MUHAN)". SoHyun then made her debut with tripleS on May 8, 2024, with the album "ASSEMBLE24".

As a member of tripleS, SoHyun was placed in the sub-units LOVElution and Visionary Vision.
